user_query: I'm planning a family gathering and I need some fun activity ideas for kids, including trending images of party games and crafts, as well as websites for printable coloring pages and educational activities.

TaskList.description: Search for trending images of kids' party games and crafts.
Compile a list of websites that offer printable coloring pages for kids.
Gather recommendations for websites that provide educational activities for children.
Aggregate results from all previous steps to provide a comprehensive list.
